entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the evening. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
